name: Color Pyramid Builder
title: Color Pyramid Builder
author: Nick Schaub (nick.schaub@nih.gov)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: inpDir
inputs.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin

inputs.name: filePattern
inputs.description: Filename pattern used to separate data

inputs.name: bounds
inputs.description: Set bounds (should be float-float, int-int, or blank, e.g. 0.01-0.99,0-16000,,,,,)

inputs.name: alpha
inputs.description: If true, transparency is related to pixel intensity, where black is fully transparent.

inputs.name: stitchPath
inputs.description: If stitching path is given, will assemble images in the collection according to the stitching vector.

inputs.name: background
inputs.description: Gray level fill intensity. Ignored if stitchPath is undefined.

ui.title: Filename pattern
ui.description: Filename pattern used to separate data

ui.title: Input collection
ui.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin

ui.title: Set rescaling bounds (optional)
ui.description: Set bounds (should be float-float, int-int, or blank, e.g. 0.01-0.99,0-16000,,,,,)

ui.title: Make black transparent (optional)
ui.description: If true, transparency is related to pixel intensity, where black is fully transparent.

ui.title: Stitching Vector (optional)
ui.description: If true, transparency is related to pixel intensity, where black is fully transparent.

ui.title: Background gray level (optional)
ui.description: Gray level fill intensity from 0-1. Ignored if stitchPath is undefined.
